bilingual.source: She had a thousand rivers in her voice.
bilingual.target: 她的声音里有千条河流。

bilingual.source: Mum's voice speaks out one last time.
bilingual.target: 妈妈的声音最后一次响起。
接电话的是一个友好的声音。

bilingual.source: Her voice danced as high as the whistles of birds.
bilingual.target: 她的声音像鸟鸣一样高。

bilingual.source: The real actor's voice is used in the film.
bilingual.target: 电影中使用了真实演员的声音。

bilingual.source: My voice comes out much louder than I expect.
bilingual.target: 我的声音比我预期的要大得多。
“别担心，”他们身后传来一个声音。

bilingual.source: "Hey!" a familiar voice called out to her.
bilingual.target: “嘿！”一个熟悉的声音叫住了她。

list.abstract: voice（英[vɔɪs]，美[vɔɪs]），英语单词，动词意思是表达；发浊音；给…调音。名词意思是说话声；嗓音；音高。短语搭配有lost voice（失声）。例句为“Eddie has long used his voice to raise awareness of environmental problems.（埃迪长期以来一直用他的声音来提高人们对环境问题的认识。）”
《Voice》（보이스）是由OCN电视台出品，金弘善执导，马珍媛担任编剧，张赫、李荷娜、金材昱主演的犯罪电视剧，于2017年1月14日在韩国OCN电视台播出。 该剧讲述了明星刑警武镇赫（张赫 饰）和警察大学的首席毕业生姜权珠（李荷娜 饰），为了追踪杀害他们家人的连锁杀人犯，从而成为真正的112举报中心队员以及警察的故事。

yingyinNormal.en: It was. It was her voice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错，那就是她的声音。

yingyinNormal.en: Wow, that was my scariest voice. You're very brave.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是我最可怕的声音，你真勇敢。

yingyinNormal.en: We love the sound of our own voice, too, evidently.
yingyinNormal.zh: 竟然某些人还能享受自己讲话的声音。

yingyinNormal.en: We've got voice verification. They're on the line, sir.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们有声音确认了，他们在线，先生。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I see rage, darkness, betrayal. A distinct voice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我看到了盛怒，黑暗和背叛，一个独特的声音。

yingyinNormal.en: You're speaking to the president. Yes, I recognize his voice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在跟总统说话。是的，我认得出他的声音。

yingyinNormal.en: Everyone thinks she's so nice with that squeaky little voice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 每个人都觉得她特好说话，声音细细的尖尖的。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello? Hello, Leonard. Hey, buddy. Good to hear your voice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你好。你好，莱纳德。兄弟，很高兴又听到你的声音。

yingyinNormal.en: I thought it was a pyramid you needed to scale, so I gave you a voice, my voice, to guide you along the way.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我认为，你需要去攀登一座金字塔，所以我给了你一个声音，我的声音，一路指引你。

yingyinNormal.en: You know whose voice that was? God? It was you, pal. Well, maybe it was God doing me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道那是谁的声音吗？上帝？是你的声音，老哥。也许是上帝模仿我的声音。

yingyinNormal.en: My voice is still my voice, Riley. You're gonna need to show me a lot more than clothes and hair and a boy before I believe that it isn't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的声音还是我的声音，莱丽，你得说出更多的东西，不只是衣服，发型和男孩子，否则我是不会相信的。

yingyinNormal.en: Is there a way to turn that voice off? I'm not sure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可以把这个声音关掉吗？我不太确定。

yingyinNormal.en: How do you do that with your voice? Do what? Nothing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的声音是怎么做到的？什么做到？没什么。

yingyinNormal.en: I told him his voice was annoying. He didn't want to listen.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我跟他说过他的声音很惹人厌。他就是不听。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. That's exactly what I think. Even his voice is different.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，我正是那么认为。他连声音都变了。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, Rachel. Hi. What's up? You're voice sounded all squeaky on the phone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 瑞秋你好吗？你电话里的声音好尖。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, you guys have fun. I'm gonna go talk to people in this voice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，你们开心吧，我要用这种声音和人聊天了。

yingyinNormal.en: I have to do the voice-recognition. It's programmed for my dysarthria.
yingyinNormal.zh: 先要做个声音识别，程序是为我发音困难设计的。

yingyinNormal.en: And that's me. Hello to the future. What a squeaky voice you have.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那个是我。你好呀，未来的人们！你们的声音好像小孩子！

yingyinNormal.en: Thank you, Mrs. Underwood. He was brave. And his voice deserves to be heard.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢谢，安德伍德夫人。他很勇敢。他的声音理应被听到。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 嗓音; 口音; 声音

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 有声的；浊音的；带声的

word_family.mean: n. 说话声；嗓音；音高；浊音；语态；呼声；发言权；代言人；腔调；喉舌

examination_example.sentence: And, assuming he says yes, it will make you feel more confident about <highlight>voicing</highlight> your disagreement.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而且，假设他同意了，这会让你对表达自己的不同意见更有信心。

examination_example.sentence: You may decide it's best to hold off on <highlight>voicing</highlight> your opinion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可能会断定最好不发表你的意见。

examination_example.sentence: tend to <highlight>voice</highlight> their opinions in cyberspace
examination_example.sentence_trans: 倾向于在网络空间表达他们的观点

sense_info_list.en: a sound similar to vocal sound
sense_info_list.zh: 嗓音; 口音; 声音

sense_info_list.en: the right to express a wish, choice, or opinion

word_usage.usage:
voice和sound都可以表示“声音”，区别在于：
sound含义广泛，可以指任何听得到的声音。
voice主要指人的声音，有时也指鸟的叫声，但很少指动物的叫声。
voice作动词表示“表达，吐露”，尤指消极情绪，如“voice concern about sth.表达对某事的担忧”。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 嗓音; 口音; 声音

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a sound similar to vocal sound
sense_info_list.zh: 嗓音; 口音; 声音

examination_example.sentence: Paying <highlight>voice</highlight> actors on an hourly basis is in line with the law.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 按小时付费给配音演员是符合法律规定的。

examination_example.sentence: SAG-AFTRA says <highlight>voice</highlight> actors don't receive residuals (追加酬金) for their gaming work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: SAG-AFTRA 表示，配音演员的游戏工作不会被追加酬金。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Voice</highlight> actors should have a pay raise if they prove to be top craftsmen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果配音演员被证明是顶尖的工匠，他们就应该加薪。

examination_example.sentence: What are the <highlight>voice</highlight> actors demanding?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 配音演员的要求是什么？

examination_example.sentence: They find their <highlight>voice</highlight> go unheeded.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们发现自己的声音无人理睬。

examination_example.sentence: With research results showing the cumulative effects of sleep loss and its impact on productivity, doubt has been <highlight>voiced</highlight> about the accuracy of Steel's self-assessment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着研究结果显示睡眠减少的累积效应及其对生产力的影响，人们对斯蒂尔自我评估的准确性表示怀疑。

examination_example.sentence: "We're in no way trying to silence parents' <highlight>voices</highlight>," Steinberg says.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 斯坦伯格说：“我们绝不试图压制父母的意见。”

sense_info_list.en: the right to express a wish, choice, or opinion

examination_example.sentence: As advocates of children's rights, we believe that children should have a <highlight>voice</highlight> about what information is shared about them if possible.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为儿童权利的倡导者，我们认为，如果可能的话，儿童应该在分享关于他们的信息方面有发言权。

word_usage.usage: “用…声音”应该用介词in，而不用其他介词。如in a very loud voice 用很高的声音。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 呼声; 意见; 态度

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Fighting, however, usually involves personal attacks, raising of <highlight>voices</highlight>, and storming out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，战斗通常包括人身攻击、提高声音和暴走。

examination_example.sentence: Our building even had a tiny lift with a female <highlight>voice</highlight> That said.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的大楼甚至有一个小电梯，里面有一个女性的声音在说话。

examination_example.sentence: Before Vinnie could say yes, the President hurried on, a shade of apology in his <highlight>voice</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 维尼还没来得及答应，总统就急忙走了，声音中带着一丝歉意。

examination_example.sentence: I was able to maintain power in my singing despite the switch to a head <highlight>voice</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管换成了头音，我还是能够保持唱歌的力量。

examination_example.sentence: This was the first time I struggled to learn a song, because my <highlight>voice</highlight> cracked (破音) as I switched to a head <highlight>voice</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是我第一次努力学习一首歌，因为当我切换到头音时，我的声音嘶哑了。

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>voice</highlight> his views on modern art.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 表达他对现代艺术的看法。

sense_info_list.zh: 呼声; 意见; 态度

examination_example.sentence: You can go such a long way to make things that look professional but still have your own <highlight>voice</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以走很长的路，让事情看起来很专业，但仍然有自己的态度。

examination_example.sentence: its significance, and its potential as a unifying (联合) <highlight>voice</highlight> across cultures.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它的重要性，以及作为跨文化统一声音的潜力。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 允许（某种情绪、意见或观点）得以表达；允许（人；集团）表达情绪
语音消息；语音留言；语音报文

sense_info_list.en: a sound similar to vocal sound
sense_info_list.zh: 嗓音; 口音; 声音

examination_example.sentence: Nobody can hear you unless you speak in a louder <highlight>voice</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除非你大声说话，否则没人能听到你的声音。

examination_example.sentence: They listened in amazement as the <highlight>voice</highlight> of a singer was heard through the wires.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们惊讶地听着通过电线传来的一个歌手的声音。

examination_example.sentence: It recognizes your mouth's movements and turns them into <highlight>voice</highlight> or text messages.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可以识别你嘴巴的动作并将其转换为语音或短信。

examination_example.sentence: It encourages doctors to <highlight>voice</highlight> their needs on the websites.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它鼓励医生在网站上表达他们的需求。

examination_example.sentence: He used his pen to fight social inequality and gave <highlight>voice</highlight> to the poor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他用他的笔来对抗社会不平等，并为穷人发声。

examination_example.sentence: In New York City, three phone booths in Time Square are turned into places for immigrant(移民) <highlight>voices</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在纽约市，时代广场的三个电话亭变成了移民发声的地方。

word_usage.usage: “用…声音”应该用介词in，而不用其他介词。如in a very loud voice 用很高的声音。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 多指不悦耳的“嘈杂声；喧闹声”等。
指人的嗓音或说话、唱歌发出的声音。
泛指人们听到的“声音”，可以指人和动物的声音，也可以指物体碰撞发出的声音或指大自然的任何声音。
